titles.title: Mourning the loss of Bea Arthur, celebrating her life and work, and honoring her many contributions to equality and social justice for all Americans.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: Mourns the loss of Bea Arthur, celebrates her life and work, and honors her many contributions to equality and social justice for all Americans.
